casebody.data:
No. 09-11328. Willie Gene Davis, Petitioner v. United States. 563 U.S. 916, 131 S. Ct. 1843,

179 L. Ed. 2d 770,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2795. April 4, 2011.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted. William W. Whatley, Esquire, of Montgomery, Alabama, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
